parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the VSS can cause the vehicle to lose power, reduce speed, and engage the brakes unexpectedly, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power
reduces speed
and engages the brakes unexpectedly

especially during left-hand turns; the vehicle wobbles or shakes; the throttle becomes unresponsive; the vehicle goes into "limp mode" with limited power and speed; the vehicle's engine light illuminates
and trouble codes for the VSS are thrown.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the vehicle to lose stability, making it difficult to control, and potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The front end of the vehicle wobbles or shakes; the vehicle pulls to one side; the steering feels loose or unstable; the vehicle's yaw rate sensor or steering angle sensor throws fault codes.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Yaw Rate Sensor or Steering Angle Sensor Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the yaw rate sensor or steering angle sensor can cause the vehicle to lose stability, making it difficult to control, and potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle's yaw rate sensor or steering angle sensor throws fault codes; the vehicle loses power
reduces speed
and engages the brakes unexpectedly; the vehicle wobbles or shakes.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Pedal Sticking and ABS Activation
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The stuck brake pedal can cause the brake lights to remain illuminated while driving, activating the ABS system, and potentially leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Brake pedal stays stuck
brake lights remain on while driving
ABS system activates
handlebar becomes loose.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Antifreeze Leak from Radiator Reservoir Tank
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The antifreeze leak can cause engine damage, overheating, and potentially lead to engine failure.
symptoms: Antifreeze leaking from radiator reservoir tank seam and cap.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The manufacturer's handling of recalls and repairs can leave owners stranded, without a means of transportation, and at risk of accidents due to known safety issues.
symptoms: Vehicle quits working due to damage
roadside assistance does not cover full cost of towing
manufacturer's recall process puts burden on owner.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The VSS malfunction can cause the vehicle to jerk erratically, lose power, and apply brakes randomly, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: VSS engages randomly on left turns
cutting engine power
applying braking
and temporary stalling
causing temporary loss of control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Tire Shuddering and Skipping on Sweeping Left Turns
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rear tire shuddering and skipping can cause loss of control, accidents, and potentially lead to injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Rear tire shudders and skips across the road on sweeping left turns
corrected temporarily by resetting YAW rate sensor and adjusting front steering rack.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent brake failure can cause the vehicle to fail to come to a complete stop, leading to accidents or collisions, and potentially causing damage to the vehicle or injury to the rider.
symptoms: The brakes fail to engage properly
requiring excessive force to stop the vehicle
the vehicle fails to stop even with the brake pedal depressed to the floor
the brakes engage unexpectedly
causing the rear-end to wobble or lock up.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Rust and corrosion can lead to structural failure, compromising the safety and integrity of the vehicle, and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Visible rust and corrosion on welds and other components
cracks in the metal
rust that can lead to full failure of the vehicle.
